list_definition.definition: not to like; to have strong feelings against

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She dislikes going to the dentist

list_definition.definition: strong feeling directed against a thing, person or idea

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He doesn’t go to football matches because of his dislike of crowds
